Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Bacteria:Erwinia carotovora (IC50=11 µg/ml), Agrobacterium radiobacter (IC50=15 µg/ml), Agrobacterium rhizogenes (IC50=20 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Clavibacter michiganensis (IC50=14 µg/ml), Curtobacterium flaccumfaciens (IC50=13 µg/ml).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=2 µg/ml), Geotrichum candidum (IC50=2 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Purification, characterization, and sequencing of novel antimicrobial peptides, Tu-AMP 1 and Tu-AMP 2, from bulbs of tulip (Tulipa gesneriana L.).
Literature.Author: Fujimura M, Ideguchi M, Minami Y, Watanabe K, Tadera K.
